application.utils

Class JsonArticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.utils.JsonArticle

  • public class JsonArticle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provide services for translate an article to JSon and vice versa

    agonzalez

      • extractBody

        private static java.lang.String extractBody(java.lang.String text)
        This method return body tag from html string. If there is'nt body the original text is returned
        Parameters:
        text - html text in wich the body tag is looked for
        Returns:
